post:
Hi there,

Xsltel OÜ is one man show registered in Estonia and been in business since 2011. managing and automating everything from home.
I use “we”, “us” and “our” on this website, emails and communication channels to represent myself and my service obviously because it seems more professional to do that.

Over the past years we have served a very large number of clients around the globe with very different and specific needs that made us very experienced in hosting industry.

I’de like to offer free cpanel shared web hosting to every new webmaster who would like to host or test a specific script.
FAQ, resource limits and terms of this offer can be found here

Xsltel OÜ

FREE cPanel Shared Web Hosting

Free cpanel web hosting with no ads or limits that sucks. intended for testers, developers and new production websites

Every new account will require phone SMS verification to narrow abuse on our services.

Best regards
Mohammed H
